channel.title: How to make a 317/PI online
channel.description:
Website sided 1. go to www.no-ip.com and register
2. download no-ip DUC client here: http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php?page=win
3. now press "Hosts/Redirects" add a host ----------------------------------------- Client sided
1. open client folder and look for gui.java and client.java
2. now press "CTRL+F" find 127.0.0.1 and change ip to the ip you selected in your no-ip host
3. now compile ------------------------------------ no-ip DUC sided
1. open no-ip DUC client you downloaded and login
2. press select host and select the host you created
3. press save dont close no-ip duc client ---------------------------------- Source sided
1. open source folder and press run.bat (YOU DONT NEED TO CHANGE IP IN SOURCE FOLDER)
---------------------------------- Utorrent sided
1. open utorrent and press "CTRL+P"
2. now open connections and change your port to 43594 or 43595
3. save
now start playing your server hope this was useful ;)

item.title: How to make a 317/PI online

@killerjens9 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:7, topic:476604”]You shouldn’t be portfowarding with utorrent, you should be portfowardimg through your router.

But gj ;)[/quote]

Thanks but with a mobile broadband you don’t need to portforward

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a 317/PI online
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

Website sided

  1. go to www.no-ip.com and register

  2. download no-ip DUC client here: http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php?page=win

  3. now press “Hosts/Redirects” add a host

Client sided

  1. open client folder and look for gui.java and client.java

  2. now press “CTRL+F” find 127.0.0.1 and change ip to the ip you selected in your no-ip host

  3. now compile

no-ip DUC sided

  1. open no-ip DUC client you downloaded and login

  2. press select host and select the host you created

  3. press save dont close no-ip duc client

Source sided

  1. open source folder and press run.bat (YOU DONT NEED TO CHANGE IP IN SOURCE FOLDER)

Utorrent sided

  1. open utorrent and press “CTRL+P”

  2. now open connections and change your port to 43594 or 43595

  3. save

now start playing your server hope this was useful
